verses.verse: Now<WG1161> in<WG1722> the fifteenth<WG4003> year<WG2094> of the reign<WG2231> of Tiberius<WG5086> Cæsar<WG2541>, Pontius<WG4194> Pilate<WG4091> being governor<WG2230> of Judæa<WG2449>, and<WG2532> Herod<WG2264> being tetrarch<WG5075> of Galilee<WG1056>, and<WG1161> his<WG846> brother<WG80> Philip<WG5376> tetrarch<WG5075> of Ituraea<WG2484> and<WG2532> of the region<WG5561> of Trachonitis<WG5139>, and<WG2532> Lysanias<WG3078> the tetrarch<WG5075> of Abilene<WG9>,

Annas<WG452> and<WG2532> Caiaphas<WG2533> being<WG1909> the high priests<WG749>, the word<WG4487> of God<WG2316> came<WG1096> unto<WG1909> John<WG2491> the son<WG5207> of Zacharias<WG2197> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048>.

And<WG2532> he came<WG2064> into<WG1519> all<WG3956> the country about<WG4066> Jordan<WG2446>, preaching<WG2784> the baptism<WG908> of repentance<WG3341> for<WG1519> the remission<WG859> of sins<WG266>;

As<WG5613> it is written<WG1125> in<WG1722> the book<WG976> of the words<WG3056> of Isaiah<WG2268> the prophet<WG4396>, saying<WG3004>, The voice<WG5456> of one crying<WG994> in<WG1722> the wilderness<WG2048>, Prepare you<WG2090> the way<WG3598> of the Lord<WG2962>, make<WG4160> his<WG846> paths<WG5147> straight<WG2117>.

Every<WG3956> valley<WG5327> shall be filled<WG4137>, and<WG2532> every<WG3956> mountain<WG3735> and<WG2532> hill<WG1015> shall be brought low<WG5013>; and<WG2532> the crooked<WG4646> shall be made<WG2071> straight<WG2117>, and<WG2532> the rough<WG5138> ways<WG3598> shall be made<WG1519> smooth<WG3006>;
And<WG2532> all<WG3956> flesh<WG4561> shall see<WG3700> the salvation<WG4992> of God<WG2316>.

Then<WG3767> said he<WG3004> to the multitude<WG3793> that came forth<WG1607> to be baptized<WG907> of<WG5259> him<WG846>, O generation<WG1081> of vipers<WG2191>, who<WG5101> has warned<WG5263> you<WG5213> to flee<WG5343> from<WG575> the wrath<WG3709> to come<WG3195>?

Bring forth<WG4160> therefore<WG3767> fruits<WG2590> worthy<WG514> of repentance<WG3341>, and<WG2532> begin<WG756> not<WG3361> to say<WG3004> inside<WG1722> yourselves<WG1438>, We have<WG2192> Abraham<WG11> to<WG3962> our father<WG3962>: for<WG1063> I say<WG3004> to you<WG5213>, That<WG3754> God<WG2316> is able<WG1410> of<WG1537> these<WG5130> stones<WG3037> to raise up<WG1453> sons<WG5043> to Abraham<WG11>.

And<WG1161> now<WG2235> also<WG2532> the axe<WG513> is laid<WG2749> to<WG4314> the root<WG4491> of the trees<WG1186>: every<WG3956> tree<WG1186> therefore<WG3767> which brings<WG4160> not<WG3361> forth<WG4160> good<WG2570> fruit<WG2590> is cut down<WG1581>, and<WG2532> cast<WG906> into<WG1519> the fire<WG4442>.
And<WG2532> the people<WG3793> asked<WG1905> him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, What<WG5101> shall we do<WG4160> then<WG3767>?

He answers<WG611> and<WG1161> says<WG3004> to them<WG846>, He that has<WG2192> two<WG1417> coats<WG5509>, let him impart<WG3330> to him that has<WG2192> none<WG3361>; and<WG2532> he that has<WG2192> food<WG1033>, let him do<WG4160> likewise<WG3668>.
Then<WG1161> came<WG2064> also<WG2532> tax collectors<WG5057> to be baptized<WG907>, and<WG2532> said<WG2036> to<WG4314> him<WG846>, Master<WG1320>, what<WG5101> shall we do<WG4160>?
And<WG1161> he said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them<WG846>, Exact<WG4238> no<WG3367> more<WG4119> than<WG3844> that which is appointed<WG1299> you<WG5213>.

And<WG1161> the soldiers<WG4754> likewise<WG2532> demanded<WG1905> of him<WG846>, saying<WG3004>, And<WG2532> what<WG5101> shall<WG4160> we<WG2249> do<WG4160>? And<WG2532> he said<WG2036> to<WG4314> them<WG846>, Do violence to<WG1286> no man<WG3367>, neither<WG3366> accuse<WG4811> any falsely<WG4811>; and<WG2532> be content<WG714> with<WG3800> your<WG5216> wages<WG3800>.

And<WG1161> as the people<WG2992> were in expectation<WG4328>, and<WG2532> all men<WG3956> mused<WG1260> in<WG1722> their<WG846> hearts<WG2588> of<WG4012> John<WG2491>, whether<WG3379> he<WG846> were<WG1498> the Christ<WG5547>, or not<WG3379>;

John<WG2491> answered<WG611>, saying<WG3004> to<WG537> them all<WG537>, I<WG1473> indeed<WG3303> baptize<WG907> you<WG5209> with water<WG5204>; but<WG1161> one mightier than<WG2478> I<WG3450> comes<WG2064>, the latchet<WG2438><WG99999> of whose<WG3739> shoes<WG5266> I am<WG1510> not<WG3756> worthy<WG2425> to unloose<WG3089>: he<WG846> shall baptize<WG907> you<WG5209> with<WG1722> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> and<WG2532> with fire<WG4442>:

Whose<WG3739> pitchfork<WG4425> is in<WG1722> his<WG846> hand<WG5495>, and<WG2532> he will throughly cleanse<WG1245> his<WG846> floor<WG257>, and<WG2532> will gather<WG4863> the wheat<WG4621> into<WG1519> his<WG846> grainery<WG596>; but<WG1161> the chaff<WG892> he will burn<WG2618> with fire<WG4442> unquenchable<WG762>.
And<WG2532> many<WG4183> other things<WG2087> in his exhortation<WG3870> preached he<WG2097> to the people<WG2992>.

But<WG1161> Herod<WG2264> the tetrarch<WG5076>, being reproved<WG1651> by<WG5259> him<WG846> for<WG4012> Herodias<WG2266> his<WG846> brother<WG80> Philip<WG5376>'s wife<WG1135>, and<WG2532> for<WG4012> all<WG3956> the evils<WG4190> which<WG3739> Herod<WG2264> had done<WG4160>,
Added<WG4369> yet<WG2532> this<WG5124> above<WG1909> all<WG3956>, that<WG2532> he shut up<WG2623> John<WG2491> in<WG1722> prison<WG5438>.

Now<WG1161> when<WG1722> all<WG537> the people<WG2992> were baptized<WG907>, it came to pass<WG1096>, that Jesus<WG2424> also<WG2532> being baptized<WG907>, and<WG2532> praying<WG4336>, the heaven<WG3772> was opened<WG455>,

And<WG2532> the<WG4151> Holy<WG40> Spirit<WG4151> descended<WG2597> in a bodily<WG4984> shape<WG1491> like<WG5616> a dove<WG4058> upon<WG1909> him<WG846>, and<WG2532> a voice<WG5456> came<WG1096> from<WG1537> heaven<WG3772>, which said<WG3004>, You<WG4771> are<WG1488> my<WG3450> beloved<WG27> Son<WG5207>; in<WG1722> you<WG4671> I am well pleased<WG2106>.

And<WG2532> Jesus<WG2424> himself<WG846> began<WG756> to be<WG2258> about<WG5616> thirty<WG5144> years of age<WG2094>, being<WG5607> (as<WG5613> was supposed<WG3543>) the son<WG5207> of Joseph<WG2501>, which was the son of Heli<WG2242>,
Which was the son of Matthat<WG3158>, which was the son of Levi<WG3017>, which was the son of Melchi<WG3197>, which was the son of Janna<WG2388>, which was the son of Joseph<WG2501>,
Which was the son of Mattathias<WG3161>, which was the son of Amos<WG301>, which was the son of Naum<WG3486>, which was the son of Esli<WG2069>, which was the son of Nagge<WG3477>,
Which was the son of Maath<WG3092>, which was the son of Mattathias<WG3161>, which was the son of Semei<WG4584>, which was the son of Joseph<WG2501>, which was the son of Judah<WG2455>,
Which was the son of Joanna<WG2490>, which was the son of Rhesa<WG4488>, which was the son of Zorobabel<WG2216>, which was the son of Salathiel<WG4528>, which was<WG3518> the son of Neri<WG3518>,
Which was the son of Melchi<WG3197>, which was the son of Addi<WG78>, which was the son of Cosam<WG2973>, which was the son of Elmodam<WG1678>, which was the son of Er<WG2262>,
Which was the son of Jose<WG2499>, which was the son of Eliezer<WG1663>, which was the son of Jorim<WG2497>, which was the son of Matthat<WG3158>, which was the son of Levi<WG3017>,
Which was the son of Simeon<WG4826>, which was the son of Judah<WG2455>, which was the son of Joseph<WG2501>, which was the son of Jonan<WG2494>, which was the son of Eliakim<WG1662>,
Which was the son of Melea<WG3190>, which was the son of Menan<WG3104>, which was the son of Mattatha<WG3160>, which was the son of Nathan<WG3481>, which was the son of David<WG1138>,
Which was the son of Jesse<WG2421>, which was the son of Obed<WG5601>, which was the son of Booz<WG1003>, which was the son of Salmon<WG4533>, which was the son of Naasson<WG3476>,
Which was the son of Aminadab<WG284>, which was the son of Aram<WG689>, which was the son of Esrom<WG2074>, which was the son of Phares<WG5329>, which was the son of Judah<WG2455>,
Which was the son of Jacob<WG2384>, which was the son of Isaac<WG2464>, which was the son of Abraham<WG11>, which was the son of Thara<WG2291>, which was the son of Nachor<WG3493>,
Which was the son of Saruch<WG4562>, which was the son of Ragau<WG4466>, which was the son of Phalec<WG5317>, which was the son of Heber<WG1443>, which was the son of Sala<WG4527>,
Which was the son of Cainan<WG2536>, which was the son of Arphaxad<WG742>, which was the son of Sem<WG4590>, which was the son of Noah<WG3575>, which was the son of Lamech<WG2984>,
Which was the son of Mathusala<WG3103>, which was the son of Enoch<WG1802>, which was the son of Jared<WG2391>, which was the son of Maleleel<WG3121>, which was the son of Cainan<WG2536>,
Which was the son of Enos<WG1800>, which was the son of Seth<WG4589>, which was the son of Adam<WG76>, which was the son of God<WG2316>.
